attributes.action: Petition for more Consideration for angel families (families of childloss)
attributes.additional_details: None standardized letters sent out and Mothers not to have to wait in or near maternity units when having their aftercare appointments. Where ever possible to have separate or sound proof rooms for delivery of our angels. Different coloured or a cleared way to distinguish our notes to show our loses. Staff members to READ our notes. Not to be made to give birth over bed pans. For photos to be taken by the hospital in every occasion and to be kept at least a year. A list of wants written pre-delivery. To have letters sent out to make parents aware when the post Morton results are back. Offers of counselling to all parents. Staff to be better trained. To have clearer definitions of loss, not just miscarriage, still birth etc. For any baby with the chance of life signs at birth to be called viable. For staff to sit and talk to parents after any loss whether it be from miscarriage to sudden infant death (SIDs).
